title: Fish
alt: [Astronomer peers into telescope] [Jaws theme begins playing]
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are walking down a hill.]
Cueball: The Fermi paradox keeps getting worse. If planets are common, where is everybody?Megan: Imagine you're a scuba diver looking at the ocean floor. You know there's a fish there, but you can't see it. Why?Cueball: Maybe the fish looks like sand.
Megan: Yeah...[Zoom out to the Earth from space.]
Megan: ...and what would that tell you about the ecosystem?[The Earth is moving out of the panel and then a shark is shown swimming through space towards Earth.]
